definitions.title: Pi. revile, blaspheme
definitions.body: (NH [[גׇּדַף]] cut, wound, then (esp. Pi) revile; Ar. jadafa cut, cut off, II. deny a favour, be ungrateful, etc.; Aram. Pa. [[גַּדֵּף]], gadep, revile)—Pf. 2 ms. [[וְגִדַּפְתָּ]] 2Ki 19:22 = Is 37:23; 3 pl. [[גִּדְּפוּ]] 2Ki 19:6 = Is 37:6; Pt. [[מְגַדֵּף]] Nu 15:30, Ps 44:17; —
revile, between man and man, (abs.) [[קוֹל]] [[מְחָרֵף וּמְגַדֵּף]] Ps 44:17 the voice of (him that) reproacheth and revileth.

blaspheme, sq. acc. ´[[י]] Nu 15:30 (P); 2Ki 19:22 = Is 37:23 (‖[[חֵרֵף]]; obj. [[אֶת־מִי]], ref. to ´[[י]] as above); Ez Eze 20:27; 2 acc. [[הַדְּבָרִים]] [[נַעֲרֵי מֶלֶח אַשּׁוּר אׂתִי]] ´[[אֲשֶׁר ג]] … 2Ki 19:6 = Is 37:6 the words with which the servants of the king of Assyria blaspheme me.
